title: How does mind-body dualism affect our daily lives? - Quora

response.answer_text: The human problem is brain dualism not a new concept but now clear as the left logical/positive brain and the faulty right anxious/negative brain, the mind is our consciousness/awareness interacting with the brain generating cognition dependant on which brain area is stimulated. EGMi maximises left brain use we become non-dual with maximised goodness, my mind, body and soul the source energy are in balance and harmony my right brain is like a faulty appendage I do not use. Religion was close on a few things dualism was one, and it is increased left brain IQ and right brain emotion that causes sin not knowledge itself, its up to us now choose a side left brain or right brain, utopia or hell on earth.

Mind-body dualism is not so important. There is no doubt that the body is a physical aspect and the mind is a subtle aspect, and there is duality. They are not, in that sense, the same. Although it is the same ‘us’, we are an embodied soul – a body-mind complex energized by a soul. But what really affects our life is realizing that we are the Divine Soul – that is what truly affects our life, transforms it and makes us liberated with bliss and joy, eliminating misery and sorrow.
